post:
[Like us on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/greencloudvps)
[Follow us on Twitter](https://twitter.com/GreenCloudVPS)

**Why Us?**

- We have been in hosting business since 2013 with years of experience.
- Owned enterprise hardware: We own all of our hardware and network equipment. We do not use consumer grade hardware, only trusted enterprise hardware from: Supermicro, Dell, Intel, Samsung & Western Digital
- Fast ticket response with average of 20 mins.
- 24x7 In-house Professional Support
- 99.9% Network Uptime Guaranteed
- 1Gbps and 10Gbps Network Connection
- 7-day money back guarantee

____________________________________________________________________________________

**Our Storage KVM VPS features:**

- Latest hardware with Dual E5 processors and Enterprise SATA in RAID-10
- SolusVM Control Panel
- KVM Virtualization
- 60Gbps DDOS protection available in Denver, CO

______________________________________________________________________________________

**500GB Plan - $10/quarter or $30/year** 
______________________________________________________________________________________

    - 2048MB RAM
    - 1 core
    - 500GB SATA RAID-10
    - IPv4: 1
    - IPv6: /112
    - Network: 1Gbps
    - 1TB Bandwidth
    - Linux OS
    - SolusVM Control Panel
    - Locations: Denver, CO; Atlanta, GA; Bucharest, RO
    
 - [ORDER DENVER](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=502 "ORDER DENVER")
 - [ORDER ATLANTA](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=500 "ORDER ATLANTA")
 - [ORDER BUCHAREST](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=501 "ORDER BUCHAREST")

____________________________________________________________________________________

**1TB PLAN- $6/mo or $50/year** 
______________________________________________________________________________________

    - 4096MB RAM
    - 2 cores
    - 1TB SATA RAID-10
    - IPv4: 1
    - IPv6: /112
    - Network: 1Gbps
    - 2TB Bandwidth
    - Linux OS
    - SolusVM Control Panel
    - Locations: Bucharest, RO; Denver, CO; Atlanta, GA

  - [ORDER DENVER](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=433 "ORDER DENVER")
  - [ORDER ATLANTA](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=410 "ORDER ATLANTA")
  - [ORDER BUCHAREST](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=412 "ORDER BUCHAREST")

Other discounted plans can be found here: https://greenkvm.com

**Payment Method:** Paypal, Credit Card, Perfect Money, Webmoney, Bitcoin, Alipay, Unionpay, Qiwi, Bank Transfer
